titles.title: To restore the previous tariff treatment accorded to hand-cast string-drawn fishing nets.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/23/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce the duty on made up hand-cast string-drawn fishing nets.
